fix: Make idempotency service thread-safe with SemaphoreSlim per key

Prevents race condition where concurrent requests with the same idempotency key
could both execute the handler. Implements double-check locking pattern:
- First check: fast path for cache hits \(no locking\)
- Lock acquisition: serialize access per cache key
- Second check: verify cache again after acquiring lock
- Execute: only one request per key executes the handler

All 18 idempotency tests pass including concurrent request scenarios.

EOF
